articles.title: Australia says Chinese warship 'illuminated' one of its planes with a laser - CNN

articles.author: Samantha Dick,
articles.title: Northern Territory marks 80th anniversary of bombing of Darwin during WWII - ABC News
articles.description: It has been 80 years since bombs dropped by the Japanese devastated Darwin, killing and injuring hundreds and destroying much of the city. Today, thousands gathered to mark one of the darkest days in Australia's wartime history.
articles.content:
Sirens sounded at 9:58am on Saturday, marking the precise moment bombs began dropping on Darwin 80 years ago.
